profile.title: Hi, Iâ€™m Brian. Nice to meet you.
profile.body: Since beginning my journey as a freelance designer 12 years ago, I've done remote work for agencies, consulted for startups, and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops.

languages.title: Languages
languages.body: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

libraries.title: Libraries
libraries.body: I love discovering new libraries and frameworks to help my work.

tools.title: Tools
tools.body: I value useful tools and platforms to simplify my workflow.

footer.title: Living, learning, & leveling up one day at a time.
